page.title: 02May Day
page.content: bring a lot to school from Bryher, mostly blue ones, and some of us get them from our gardens. When all the decorating is finished we bring all our chairs out and a table for the school cassette recorder and the tapes for the dances. We have our celebration in the afternoon. It takes about an hour. We have our dinner and we go to our Head Teacher's house to change into our dresses. I was the May Queen so I wore a long white dress with pearl buttons and a pearl necklace. I had some white sandals. Jane Bird made some posies for Winona,Helen,Claire,Francesca and I as the May Queen had a crown made of flowers. When it is time to come out of the house the guards ring the bell. We come out and line up. The girls
